name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on bench, grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder width, lower to chest with control, press up explosively

name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, squat down keeping chest up and knees tracking over toes, drive through heels to stand

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip barbell, keep back straight, drive through heels and squeeze glutes to lift

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, press barbell overhead keeping core tight, lower with control

name: Pull-up
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip, pull body up until chin clears bar, lower with control

name: Push-up
instructions: Start in plank position, lower body until chest nearly touches ground, push back up maintaining straight line

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Bent over with one knee on bench, pull dumbbell to side of torso, squeeze shoulder blade, lower with control

name: Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, curl weights up keeping elbows stationary, squeeze biceps at top

name: Tricep Dip
instructions: Sit on edge of bench or chair, lower body by bending elbows, push back up using triceps

name: Plank
instructions: Hold straight line from head to heels, engage core, keep hips level, breathe normally

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward into lunge position, lower back knee toward ground, push back to starting position

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie on inclined bench, press dumbbells up from chest level, squeeze at top, lower with control

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at machine, pull bar down to upper chest, squeeze shoulder blades together, control the weight up

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in machine, place feet on platform, lower weight by bending knees, press through heels to extend

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, press overhead, lower with control

name: Running
instructions: Maintain steady pace, land on midfoot, keep upright posture, breathe rhythmically

name: Cycling
instructions: Maintain steady cadence, adjust resistance as needed, keep core engaged

name: Burpees
instructions: Start standing, drop to squat, jump back to plank, do push-up, jump feet to squat, jump up with arms overhead

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly, maintain plank position

name: Full Body Stretching
instructions: Hold each stretch for 15-30 seconds, breathe deeply, never force the stretch
